paragraph: To schedule a free consultation, call us today at 559-713-0159.
subHeading: Personalized Legal Representation by Compassionate, Dedicated and Experienced Attorneys
valueProp:
Nelson Rozier & Christenson is a personal injury law firm with over four decades of experience serving Visalia and surrounding cities in California’s central valley. The attorneys at the firm specialize in personal injury law and have a track record of securing significant settlements for their clients. They provide compassionate and expert representation to help clients navigate the complexities of personal injury cases.

The firm's attorneys have a deep understanding of the legal and emotional challenges that clients face after suffering serious injuries due to someone else's negligence. They are committed to fighting for the maximum settlement to provide stability and support for their clients during difficult times. With a focus on personalized attention and effective negotiation, Nelson Rozier & Christenson is dedicated to helping clients seek the compensation they deserve.
